se_val:
I like your hands.

Click "Choose Love" at the bottom of the "Choose Love" page. Click the middle to go to the payment form.

We currently accept Brazilian Real (BRL), but other currencies will be added soon

Thanks for your help.
donation_subtitle: Please help me find the ship.
order_confirmed: We appreciate beauty. This is very important. Please believe in our work and help us get results. Your support will help us achieve our goals. We couldn't do this without the help of people like you. What does that mean?
